name: Gothwane Towers
summary: Welcome to Gothwane Towers, where murder is imminent! Carefully observe the occupants of the house. You may be called upon to identify a suspect. Gothwane Towers was created in December 2020 for the concurrent 7DFPS and PROCJAM game jams. It is a spiritual successor to Where's Tango? and a loving homage to the works of Edward Gorey and Agatha Christie.
